name: AVPictureInPictureSampleBufferPlaybackDelegate
desc: A protocol for controlling playback from a sample buffer display layer in Picture in Picture.

items.name: func pictureInPictureController(AVPictureInPictureController, setPlaying: Bool)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user requested to begin or pause playback.

items.name: func pictureInPictureControllerTimeRangeForPlayback(AVPictureInPictureController) -> CMTimeRange
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the current playable time range.

items.name: func pictureInPictureControllerIsPlaybackPaused(AVPictureInPictureController) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks delegate to indicate whether the playback UI reflects a playing or paused state, regardless of the current playback rate.

items.name: func pictureInPictureController(AVPictureInPictureController, didTransitionToRenderSize: CMVideoDimensions)
items.desc: Tells the delegate when the system Picture in Picture window changes size.

items.name: func pictureInPictureController(AVPictureInPictureController, skipByInterval: CMTime, completion: () -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user has requested skipping forward or backward by the indicated time interval.

items.name: func pictureInPictureControllerShouldProhibitBackgroundAudioPlayback(AVPictureInPictureController) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to always prohibit background audio playback.
